title: 3 and Out - Dan Snyder Double Down; OTA Pushback; Bizarro QB Market Continues; Headlines; Mailbag
itunes:title: 3 and Out - Dan Snyder Double Down; OTA Pushback; Bizarro QB Market Continues; Headlines; Mailbag
description:
In this episode, John looks at Washington Owner Daniel Snyder attempting to take total control over the WFT, why the corona year has helped make the NFL players' case against OTA's, and why Andy "QB1" Dalton is just the latest in a bizarre off-season QB market. He also runs down the top stories form around the league and answers listener questions in the Middlekauff Mailbag. Follow John on Twitter and SUBSCRIBE now to get all the latest content!!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
